TEXT: Runecraft uses the power of spells against opponents. Their 'Spellboost' cards become cheaper and stronger everytime they use Skill card. NL Cast spells to Spellboost your hand and overwhelm your opponent.

Forestcraft strategies use bands of fairies in battle. They have cards that fill your hand with lots of low-cost 'Fairy' cards. NL You can easily play multiple cards in one turn and activate other Forestcraft cards' abilities, giving you more power.

The Shadowcraft class harnesses 'Shadows' to utilize the power of 'Necromancy'. Shadows are added whenever you play a card. NL Spend Shadows using Necromancy at the right time to control the battlefield.
The Bloodcraft class has cards that lower your defense in order to activate powerful effects. NL Paying attention to the remaining HP of both you and your enemies is the key to victory.
You will enter this state once you have no more than 1/2 of your HP left. Certain cards have extra effects with Vengeance.

Portalcraft shifts reality with potent strategies. They can use the power of 'Resonance' and Artifact ('AF') cards to skillfully manipulate the battle. NL Try to activate multiple effects at once when you add AF cards to your deck and hand.
Resonance effects occur when your draw pile has an even number of remaining cards. Certain cards have extra effects with Resonance.
Many loyal Followers stand at the ready of a Swordcraft leader. Summon Commanders and Officers to strengthen your army. NL Play them alongside each other to gain an advantage in battle.

The main strategy of Havencraft is to play Countdown 'Amulets' which will activate a few turns after they're played. NL You can overwhelm the opponent by using cards that sped up or activate the Amulets.
